title: Manage Crowd at a Public Protest
description: A large, unplanned protest is forming. An operator must monitor crowd size and density to ensure public safety.

tasks.description: Use camera analytics to monitor the growing crowd at 'City Hall Plaza'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets real-time estimates of crowd count and density.

tasks.description: Set an alert threshold for when crowd density exceeds a safe limit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent configures an alert to trigger if density becomes dangerous.

tasks.description: Share the live crowd monitoring dashboard with the police command center.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides police with situational awareness.
